description:
I am single, never married and no kids. I am well educated, with a decent job, and i like to respect friends and family. I am working with one of premium alcoholic beverages company and take care of export marketing.

If you are interested we can be friends to start with and can grow older together by hand in hand. I am in a very serious search of a life partner to lead for the marriage.

I don't drink alcohol, but i can give good company to the friends who drink alcohol.
